name: The End (SilentWind21)
description:
You are an employee at a government run facility called Forevermore. All is going well, until one day alarms start blazing, and the facility is put under lockdown. With little to no information to go on, you must figure out the best way for you to get out while learning the dark secrets that Forevermore does not want getting out. Will you make it? Or will this be The End?

The End is a visual novel game where your choices will determine what you will learn about the shady company Forevermore as well as determine what fate awaits for you and your fellow workers. Will you and your coworkers survive, or will this be The End?
